Question
========

Daan pays €30 a year for device insurance. He thinks that the probability is 0.1 that in the coming year the device will need to be needs to be repaired, and the probability of more than one repair is then 0. A repair costs €100 if he does not take insurance, and costs nothing if he does take insurance. Should Dan then take insurance if he is acting rationally?

Answerlist
----------

* Yes
* No

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Yes: Incorrect
* No: Correct
